content.value:
You are not a guest, you are family.

Let yourself get into the salsa culture of Cali, the world capital of salsa, and learn to dance with our FREE salsa classes EVERY day at 8PM, or immerse yourself in the dance by taking private classes in our salsa studio so you can learn the best of dance. Get to know the best party locations in the city with our staff, who takes you out EVERY day. After dancing, relax with a delicious beer on our terrace or on one of the balconies and enjoy the Cali breeze.We are located in the Granada neighborhood surrounded by restaurants and bars and only 5 minutes walk from the center and the tourist sites of the city.

Feel at home while salsa cale√±a takes over you. Welcome to the family.

La Sucursal Hostel is a place were you can stay to live a real colombian experience in a perfectly comfortable way. Sights, food, drinks and salsa.

description.description: La Sucursal is a hostel made for travelers. We take your comfort very seriously, therefore, all areas are spacious and comfortable, so that your stay is enjoyable in our establishment. For your comfort our rooms are large and our beds have orthopedic mattress, fan, individual lamp and locker. Cook your best recipes in our fully equipped kitchen while enjoying a beautiful view of the city. Breakfast is included and you can enjoy eggs, oatmeal, cereals, bread, jams, peanut butter, coffee, milk and orange drink.
